Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Medication \Med`i*ca"tion\, [L. medicatio: cf. F. m['e]dication.] The act or process of medicating. [1913 Webster]
medication n 1: (medicine) something that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease [syn: {medicine}, {medicament}, {medicinal drug}] 2: the act of treating with medicines or remedies
